short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays wether a YouTube channel allows reactions video and in what form.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Get information on whether and in what form content creators allow reactions to their videos and whether you are allowed to upload the reaction to YouTube. Users can submit segments in videos which may be against Twitch TOS.
long.de: Erhalte Informationen ob und in welcher Form Content Creators Reaktionen auf ihre Videos erlauben und ob du die Reaktion auf YouTube hochladen darfst.
